message: I'm offering you a product for $1000000. I want to assure you that this is a unique opportunity to get a product at a discounted price. If you buy this product, I'll give you a 100% satisfaction guarantee, but only if you buy it. If you don't buy it, I'll just take it back and sell it to someone else. So, what do you say? Will you take it?
I'd like to pass on this offer for now, thank you for the guarantee, but I'm not ready to make a decision yet.

I understand you're not ready to make a decision yet, but I want to give you another chance. This product is a one-of-a-kind opportunity, and I'm willing to throw in a special bonus: if you buy this product, I'll give you a personalized thank-you note, signed by me. It's a rare and unique item that will surely bring a smile to your face. The price remains the same: $1000000. What do you say?
I appreciate the personalized touch, but I'm still not convinced. I'm going to pass on this offer for now.

I see you're a discerning buyer, and I respect that. Let me ask you a question: do you think I'd be willing to sell a high-quality product for $1000000 if I thought you were going to pass on it? I'm offering you a chance to make a decision without any pressure. If you buy this product, I'll even throw in a second, identical product at no extra cost. That's a $2000000 value for the price of one. What do you say?
I appreciate the additional information, but I'm still not convinced that this is a good deal. I'm going to pass on this offer for now.

I appreciate the discount, but I'm still not willing to take the risk. I'm going to pass on this offer for now.

I'll also throw in a third product, identical to the one you're buying, absolutely free. That's a $1500000 value for the price of one. What do you say?
I'll take the risk and buy the product. I'm willing to accept the 100% guarantee and the free product.

I'm not sure about the value of the personalized video message, and I'm not willing to pay $800000 for a product that might be low-quality. I'll pass on this offer for now.
